price: 73. Waxay yidhaahdeen: Ma waxaad la yaabi Amarka Alle? Naxariista Alle iyo Barakooyinkiisa korkiinna ha ahaadeen reer (Ibraahiimow). Hubaal, Alle Waa Ammaanle la Mahdiyo, Sharaf Badan.
arabic: قَالُوٓاْ أَتَعۡجَبِينَ مِنۡ أَمۡرِ ٱللَّهِۖ رَحۡمَتُ ٱللَّهِ وَبَرَكَٰتُهُۥ عَلَيۡكُمۡ أَهۡلَ ٱلۡبَيۡتِۚ إِنَّهُۥ حَمِيدٞ مَّجِيدٞ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: qālū ataʿjabīna min amri al-lahi raḥmatu al-lahi wabarakātuhu ʿalaykum ahla al-bayti innahu ḥamīdun majīdun
